infobar.default: Welcome to the site! Check out our latest blog posts and tutorials.

who.title: Who I Am
who.content: I'm a developer, translator and a former teacher with an interest in making things that are helpful to others and what I personally find to be kinda cool. I enjoy learning new things and sharing what I know with others.

what.title: What I Do
what.content: I specialize in full-stack development, crafting responsive web applications which make the internet fun again. I'm interested in expanding into 3D and XR site development as well as game development.

vision.title: My Vision
vision.content: I believe in building technology that makes a positive impact. Whether that be through making something practical and useful, or something that brings joy and wonder to others.
